meanings.sent1: She pulled the soft counterpane up to her chin before falling asleep.
meanings.sent2: The counterpane on the bed matched the curtains perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten thought the counterpane was a giant playground.
meanings.sent4: The moonlight draped over the counterpane like a silvery blanket.
meanings.sent5: The intricate stitching on the counterpane told a story of its own.

meanings.definition: To cover with a bedspread or coverlet.
meanings.sent1: She would counterpane the bed neatly every morning.
meanings.sent2: The mother gently counterpaned her sleeping child with a warm blanket.
meanings.sent3: He decided to counterpane the picnic table with a checkered cloth.
meanings.sent4: The snow counterpaned the ground in a blanket of white.
meanings.sent5: The chef would counterpane the cake with a layer of smooth frosting.
